judges: Before Bell, C. J., Mtjsmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The Orders of the Superior Court and the Court of Quarter Sessions of Montgomery County are reversed, and the case is remanded for a new trial on Bill No. 63, November Sessions, 1957, on the dissenting opinion of Judge Hoffman of the Superior Court, at 211 Pa. Superior Ct. 259 at 260.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Menry T. Crocker, Assistant District Attorney, with him Richard A. Berlin and Anthony J. Scvrica, Assistant District Attorney, and Richard S. Lowe, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Allen, Petitioner.
Before Bell, C. J., Mtjsmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Dominic P. Costa, for petitioner.
Menry T. Crocker, Assistant District Attorney, with him Richard A. Berlin and Anthony J. Scvrica, Assistant District Attorney, and Richard S. Lowe, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, respondent.
March 1, 1968:
